about_the_game:
This is a visual feast of bright stars, a spiritual journey of excellent traditional culture, and also a conversion of wandering soul to the vast universe.
This is a software that can experience traditional Chinese astronomy, traditional culture and Tibetan astrology through immersive stargazing. It has more than 300000 words of traditional cultural information and more than 20000 stars in the whole sky. A large number of rich cultural connotations are combined with the ethereal stargazing environment. It is equipped with more than 300 exquisite illustrations. It can also light up the Kongming lamp, feel the unique charm of our culture's cosmology and philosophy, Unconsciously feel the spiritual nourishment of the excellent oriental traditional culture.
The star parameters and other data in the software are strongly supported by the National Earth System Science Data Center. The ecliptic, celestial equator, Milky Way, three enclosures, four symbols and twenty eight star mansions are displayed one by one in the sky, and can dynamically display the true starry sky changes at the dusk of the twenty-four solar terms by adjusting the time axis.
The astrology in the software is derived from the Tibetan Tantric Sutra. It is a very mysterious divination system that has been handed down for thousands of years. It can help users understand themselves and the relations with others from a higher dimension, and help users to handle interpersonal relationships with ease.
This software is both popular science and entertainment, immersive restoration of the real and vast starry sky, It is very suitable for the modern people who are under pressure, need to relax and heal their mood with the starry sky. At the same time, it is also a good tool for traditional culture lovers and astrologers.
